summary: Added key infrastructure for multi-family saturation (constant family predicates, K distribution lemma, modal existence lemma) but 3 sorries remain due to fundamental mathematical gaps in the Zorn/Lindenbaum approach. The infrastructure is sound; the gaps require controlled Lindenbaum construction or alternative approach.

artifacts.summary: Added constant family predicates, K distribution chain lemma, derivation to theorem helper, and modal existence lemma
Detailed analysis of remaining sorries and recommendations

partial_progress.details: Phase 1 (BoxContent Temporal Uniformity) partially complete. Added infrastructure but 3 sorries remain. Mathematical gaps documented in summary.

errors.message: Multi-family BoxContent consistency requires modal positive introspection or restricted BoxContent
errors.recommendation: Consider controlled Lindenbaum construction or constant family restriction

errors.message: Temporal uniformity requires constant family assumption
errors.recommendation: Restrict theorem to constant family collections (sufficient for actual use case)

errors.message: Lindenbaum extension can add Box formulas breaking coherence
errors.recommendation: Develop controlled Lindenbaum that avoids adding unnecessary Box formulas

next_steps: Consider: (1) Restrict theorem to constant families only, (2) Develop controlled Lindenbaum construction, (3) Continue using axiom-based approach for completeness
